VoiceCallRecording.name: VoiceCallRecording
VoiceCallRecording.description: Represents a call recording in Service Cloud Voice and Sales Dialer.

DurationInSeconds.description: The total length (in seconds) of the voice call recording.

IntelligenceScore.description: The intelligence score of the recording.

IsConsented.description: Whether the call recording was indicated as consented or not.

MediaContentId.description: The ID of the related media content, a ContentDocument. The record counts toward your orgâ€™s file storage quota.

Name.description: The name of the call recording file.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of the call recording.

UploadDateTime.description: The time and date that the recording was uploaded.

VoiceCallId.description: Required. The ID of the related phone call. The property nillable has been removed in API version 50.0 and later.
